Room.Name: Oceancrest Memorial Fountain
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing in a fountain with approximately one foot of water in it.
Room.LongDescription: The Oceancrest Memorial Fountain was built to commemorate the victory over the orcs of Kandmanni nearly two centuries ago. It stands as a proud memorial to those who live in Oceancrest, and is generally considered to be the center of town, even though it's in the southwest corner of Oceancrest. There is a circular path around the fountain.
